mdx.excerpt: I show how to set up Redux together with TypeScript. Redux is a common library that is used with React for global state management.  I explain how to configure the basic Redux configuration.

frontmatter.title: Setting up Redux with TypeScript
frontmatter.excerpt: I show how to set up Redux together with TypeScript. Redux is a common library that is used with React for global state management.  I explain how to configure the basic Redux configuration.

node.excerpt: I discovered an interesting movie about gender inequality in the tech-industry which present and recommend here.
I pick up the Redux Architecture which I developed in my last two posts and show how to obtain a typization of the Redux hooks. For this, I introduce and explain discriminated union types.
I continue with the App which I created in my last post. I discuss different techniques that improve the structure of the React/Redux/TypeScript Architecture.
I show how to set up Redux together with TypeScript. Redux is a common library that is used with React for global state management.  I explain how to configure the basic Redux configuration.
Continuing with the library developed in my last post, I show how to configure a testing environment, define test for the clock component and how to run and interpret those tests.
